messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 17
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/6/01 2:20:33 PM, jnjstau@gvtc.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/6/01 2:20:33 PM, jnjstau@... writes:

<< I got them some Harry Potter Quidditch cards....only problem is I can't
figure out how to play from the directions :( >>

We like this game! We found the directions a bit obtuse as well, but as you
start playing, it becomes clearer. If you have a specific question.....?

Sharon

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 17
messages.msgSnippet: My oldest 2 are 11 and 8, but they are really good at strategy games. Problem is they are poor at reading directions.  So I
messages.messageBody:
<<Hmmmm....how old are your kids?>>

My oldest 2 are 11 and 8, but they are really good at strategy games.
Problem is they are poor at reading directions. So I have to figure out the
basics and then we play a sample game and the kids catch on.

I got them some Harry Potter Quidditch cards....only problem is I can't
figure out how to play from the directions :(

Julie

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 17
messages.msgSnippet: San Antonio. A friend just told me a gaming shop was opening up in a mall in town.  Maybe I ll just try to hang out in there and ask
messages.messageBody:
<<What town are you in?>>

San Antonio.

A friend just told me a gaming shop was opening up in a mall in town. Maybe
I'll just try to hang out in there and ask some questions.

Julie
